title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 1007.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 1007.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall be applicable to every person or entity
seeking state certification to establish and operate a medical respite program
pursuant to article 29-J of the Public Health Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
1007.1

Adopted

New

York State Register January 31, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 5, eff. 1/31/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
